cip.render.raytrace

Class LightInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • cip.render.raytrace.LightInfo

  • public class LightInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the description of the light illuminating a ray intersection with a surface. Because illumination descriptions are frequently used temporary objects, this object can be used as both a typical object instantiated using the new and reclaimed by the garbage collector when the are no longer references to the object, and/or a cached object which is borrowed from a dynamically growing cache of LightInfo objects.
    Since:
    1.0
